title: 105_s1477
content:
Reimportation of certain goods is amended in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States by inserting a new subheading in Subchapter I of chapter 98. "Articles previously imported with duty paid upon such importation if" Articles previously imported with duty paid upon such importation if exported within 3 years after the date of such previous importation, sold for exportation and exported to. Individuals can reimport articles for personal use without increasing their value or condition. When abroad, articles can be manufactured or obtained by other means and then reimported as personal returns. When abroad, articles can be manufactured or obtained by other means and then reimported as personal returns, whether or not consolidated with other returns prior to reimportation. When abroad, articles can be reimported within 1 year by the person who exported them from the United States. "Articles can be reimported within 1 year by the person who exported them from the United States."

Step 4: Output the summarized chunk

"Articles can be reimported within 1 year." The amendment applies to goods described in subheading 9801.00.26 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule reimported into the US 15 days after enactment.
